SEARCH
Package gutek.gui.controllers.menu

Class MenuBarFXMLController

java.lang.Object
gutek.gui.controllers.FXMLController
gutek.gui.controllers.menu.MenuBarFXMLController
@Component public class MenuBarFXMLController extends FXMLController
The `MenuBarFXMLController` class manages the menu bar of the application, providing options for navigating between views and managing language and session settings.

      private javafx.scene.image.ImageView newIcon
      Icon for the "New" menu item. Used to navigate to the view for creating a new deck.

    • trashIcon

      private javafx.scene.image.ImageView trashIcon
      Icon for the "Trash" menu item. Used to open the view where deleted decks can be managed.

      private javafx.scene.image.ImageView authorsIcon
      Icon for the "Authors" menu item. Represents an icon for navigating to the authors view.

    • exitIcon

      private javafx.scene.image.ImageView exitIcon
      Icon for the "Exit" menu item. Used to represent the exit action in the file menu.

    • logoutMenuIcon

      private javafx.scene.image.ImageView logoutMenuIcon
      Icon for the "Logout" menu. Displays an icon for the session management menu.

    • logoutIcon

      private javafx.scene.image.ImageView logoutIcon
      Icon for the "Logout" menu item. Represents an icon for logging out of the application.

  • Constructor Details

    • MenuBarFXMLController

      public MenuBarFXMLController(MainStage stage, FXMLFileLoader fxmlFileLoader, TranslationService translationService)
      Constructs the `MenuBarFXMLController` and loads the menu bar view from FXML.
      Parameters:
      stage - The main stage of the application.
      fxmlFileLoader - Utility for loading FXML files.
      translationService - The service used for managing translations.

    • createFlagIcon

      private javafx.scene.image.ImageView createFlagIcon(Locale locale)
      Creates an ImageView containing the flag icon for the specified Locale. This method uses the IconUtil class to generate an icon based on the country code from the given Locale. The flag icon is loaded from the resources folder.
      Parameters:
      locale - the Locale object representing the language and country.
      Returns:
      an ImageView containing the flag icon, or an empty ImageView if the icon is not found.

    • updateLanguageMenuIcons

      private void updateLanguageMenuIcons(double scaleFactor)
      Updates the flag icons in the language menu to reflect the current application locale and scales them according to the provided scale factor. This method sets the flag icon for the main language menu item to reflect the currently selected language. It also iterates through each language menu item, scaling its icon based on the current scale factor.
      Parameters:
      scaleFactor - the scale factor used to adjust the size of each flag icon.

    • initializeMenuIcons

      private void initializeMenuIcons()
      Initializes the icons for menu without languages menu. This method sets the initial icons for the menu items and stores them so they can be resized later.

    • updateFileMenuIcons

      private void updateFileMenuIcons(double scaleFactor)
      Updates the size of each icon in the menu according to the given scale factor.
      Parameters:
      scaleFactor - the scale factor used to adjust the size of each icon in fileMenu.
